title: Smoked eel and cream cheese mousse with griddled ciabatta

default: salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Mix all the ingredients together in a bowl. Use two spoons to shape the mixture into three quenelles (rugby ball shapes).
To serve, place a quenelle of smoked eel mousse on top of each slice of griddled ciabatta. Sprinkle with cayenne pepper and serve.
